underlying_goal: Implement an external post tracking feature across API and frontend repos, then iteratively refine the UI with tabbed filtering, inline-editable titles, and reusable components from another project
friction_detail: Recurring CSS/layout issues with post titles overlapping the Platform column required multiple fix attempts, and Claude initially looked at the wrong component when asked to research the SegmentedControl from the other app.
brief_summary: User wanted a full external post tracking feature (API + frontend) with iterative UI refinements including tabs, inline editing, and a borrowed SegmentedControl component; the feature was largely built but CSS layout fixes required multiple iterations.
